attributes.title: NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible and let me tell u why. After downloading this app my phone starting glitching and a virus appeared. Also the app is very slow and this orange old dude kept appearing on the screen and his face was very disturbing to look at. I think it will scare children and give them nightmares for years. This app is very inappropriate I dont recommend it at ALL!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I am so outraged. The second I downloaded this app and ran it Donald J. Trump himself crawled out of it screaming. As we tried to calm him down he drop kicked my grandparents, spit in my younger brothers Cheerios, and stole all of our valuables before running out the door. To make matters worse the app is super glitchy and completely wrecked my phone. It was a terrible experience lots of changes need to be made.

attributes.title: Horrid app
attributes.review: I saw my son using this app so I went on the App Store and got it. WORDT MISTAKE OF MY LIFE!! As soon as I downloaded it my phone started acting weird and shut down. I had to go directly to Apples manager to have them fix it. They told me that the app had some hidden SPYWARE in it and that made my phone crash. I was so disgusted. I got home and immediately took my sons phone to get this horrid app of of it.
